Text.Value: No... you need to leave. Put as much distance as you can between yourself and that monster.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale glances back towards where he came from, before turning back to  the player.
EditorData.NodeContext: hushed dread on 'no', glancing over his shoulder

Text.Value: Orin. She snatched me up, from our camp. Brought me down here to her temple. A Bhaalist enclave.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [DG] Minthara (Orin) transforms into her true self

Text.Value: Orin. Orin the Red.
You wouldn't say that. Not if you'd suffered a fraction of what was done to me. By Orin's hand.

EditorData.stateContext: Gale comes lurching towards them from the darkness of the undercity. He is bloodied, bruised, clutching a wound on his side

Text.Value: All right. We'll turn back and figure out a way to deal with her. Thank you.
That's not for you to decide.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale's terror and anguish suddenly slips away, replaced with a cruel sneer.
EditorData.NodeContext: Sudden shift from terror to knowing cruelty - Orin is about to reveal herself

Text.Value: Oh, something you're undoubtedly familiar with.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale's terror and anguish suddenly slips away, replaced with a cruel sneer.
EditorData.NodeContext: Sudden shift from terror and anguish to taunting cruelty

Text.Value: A few choice cuts and sweetmeats. Nothing fatal - not with my knife-work - but perhaps a tad... diminishing.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale's terror and anguish suddenly slips away, replaced with a cruel sneer.
EditorData.NodeContext: Sudden shift from terror and anguish to taunting cruelty

Text.Value: Is that... is that truly you...? I thought I might never see you again.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [DG] Gale running towards the player, limping, holding his side.
[DG] Laezel (Orin) transforms into her true form.

Text.Value: You will not stand alone. We face her together.
Look, you can't fight her. She's too strong. Turn around. I'm done running. I'll buy you what time I can.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Another giggle. This one louder. Closer. (Orin) Gale readies himself for a fight, clearly not in good shape to take on anyone, never mind Orin.

Text.Value: Gale, what exactly did she cut off?
How long has it been? A tenday? Longer? I can't even tell... She did things to me... such awful things. Even I don't have the words. She... she took things from me...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: At the end of the line, Gale glances down briefly - hint that he's been castrated

Text.Value: Whatever you're running from, it holds no threat for me.
What monster?
You face her already.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale's terror and anguish suddenly slips away, replaced with a cruel sneer.
EditorData.NodeContext: Sudden shift from terror and anguish to taunting cruelty

Text.Value: Gale, you're hurt. What happened?
Hold on. What are you doing down here?
That's it? You'd leave him, filleted and afraid, to fend for himself? So cold. So cruel.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale's terror and anguish suddenly slips away, replaced with a cruel sneer.
EditorData.NodeContext: Sudden shift from terror and anguish to taunting cruelty

Text.Value: She let me run. She likes the sport of it... told me I could earn back what she cut off. My trophy, she said, if I could outpace her...
I'm not leaving without you.
She snatched me up, from our camp. Brought me down here to her temple. A Bhaalist enclave.
Orin happened.

Synopsis: In certain areas in the Undercity, Orin will abduct and impersonate a target companion. Choice of target is the same as the camp abduction, but method and impersonation is not tied to the camp.
